about_the_game:
Abducted, you find yourself on the Dark Side of the Moon in a crashed flying saucer wearing a cracked space-suit helmet, under the watchful eye of Obergruppenführer Gruber of the Fourth Reich. One thing is certain: you have to escape.


”The right kind of game for Iron Sky franchise, beautiful atmosphere right from the classic Lucasfilm era, with appropriately beautiful graphics.” -Iron Sky director Timo Vuorensola

A Lunar Adventure is a snack size (play time <1 hour) story point & click adventure in the world of the Iron Sky films.

highlighted.name: Have you tried turning it off and on again?
My spaceship knows which way to go

detailed_description:
Abducted, you find yourself on the Dark Side of the Moon in a crashed flying saucer wearing a cracked space-suit helmet, under the watchful eye of Obergruppenführer Gruber of the Fourth Reich. One thing is certain: you have to escape.


”The right kind of game for Iron Sky franchise, beautiful atmosphere right from the classic Lucasfilm era, with appropriately beautiful graphics.” -Iron Sky director Timo Vuorensola

A Lunar Adventure is a snack size (play time <1 hour) story point & click adventure in the world of the Iron Sky films.

short_description: You find yourself on the Moon in a downed flying saucer wearing a cracked space-suit helmet, under the watchful eye of Obergruppenführer Gruber of the Fourth Reich. One thing is certain: you don't belong here.
supported_languages:
English*, Finnish, French, German, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support
